turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm great. I'd like to place an order from Starbucks if you can help me out?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what Starbucks would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks on Chestnut Street in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking to get a tall Caramel Macchiato with non-fat milk, and with cream, and caramel on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a tall Caramel Macchiato with non-fat milk, caremel and whipped cream on top from the Starbucks on Chestnut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is all set and will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes, the reciept will arrive via mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome, have a great day, bye.
